fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Climate Action
head_office_address: Unit 16, Trinity Technology & Enterprise Campus, Pearse Street,
eu_initiatives: As well as leading on social innovation in Ireland we have a parallel objective of developing a culture of philanthropy in Ireland. This work brings us into to contact with government officials and policymakers. We are also a member of the European Venture Philanthropy Association.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: Our purpose is to find and back innovative solutions to critical social issues in Ireland. Our mission is to provide cash grants and business supports to non-profit organisations so they can scale up, reach as many people as possible and have a widespread impact on critical social problems such as unemployment, poverty and health. Our vision is to create the world’s best eco-system for social innovation in Ireland.
